alert.note: Alert for Kern (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 20 at 8:58PM PDT until August 21 at 12:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central California, including the following counties, Kern and Tulare. * WHEN...Until midnight PDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 858 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bakersfield, Delano, Arvin, Shafter, McFarland, Lamont, Weedpatch, Rosedale, Mettler, Tupman, Stallion Springs, Dustin Acres, Valley Acres, Frazier Park, Richgrove, Oildale, Edison, Famoso, Democrat and Bear Valley Springs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
